import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get SAML Settings of Prisma Cloud Compute</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v32.03/settings/saml"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"authConfiguration","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Returns the configured SAML settings that is used to authenticate to the Prisma Cloud Compute console.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/saml
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

SamlSettings are the saml connectivity settings

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"appId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AppID is the Azure application ID.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>appSecret</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Secret Stores the plain and encrypted version of a value. The plain version is not stored in a database

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"encrypted"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies an encrypted value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"plain"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies the plain text value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"audience"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Audience specifies the SAML audience used in the verification of the SAML response.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Cert is idp certificate in PEM format.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"consoleURL"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ConsoleURL is the external Console URL that is used by the IDP for routing the browser after login.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether saml settings are enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"groupAttribute"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"GroupAttribute is the name of the group attribute.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"issuer"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Issuer is idp issuer id.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"providerAlias"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ProviderAlias is the provider alias used for display.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"skipAuthnContext"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"SkipAuthnContext indicates whether request authentication contexts should be skipped.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tenantId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"TenantID is the Azure Tenant ID.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"identity.SamlType (string)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`okta,gsuite,ping,shibboleth,azure,adfs`]"} schema={{"description":"SamlType represents the type of a SAML configured settings","enum":[["okta","gsuite","ping","shibboleth","azure","adfs"]],"type":"string","title":"identity.SamlType"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"URL is idp sso url.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"appId\": \"string\",\n  \"appSecret\": {\n    \"encrypted\": \"string\",\n    \"plain\": \"string\"\n  },\n  \"audience\":
